H0.text: Metal is most likely covered by plastic because plastic conducts very little thermal energy or electricity.

H1.text: Wood would most likely be covered with plastic because plastic conducts very little thermal energy or electricity.

H2.text: Solids are most likely covered by plastic because plastic conducts very little thermal energy or electricity.

H3.text: Liquids would most likely be covered by plastic because plastic conducts very little thermal energy or electricity.
